EmailTemplate.subject: It's almost Christmas - Volunteer & bring some cheer!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Give time, get ahead this Christmas!
Take a look at the journey we could take you on!
Trouble logging your volunteering hours? Email: HeadStart@the-challenge.org
Have a great Christmas!
Questions?
Email: headstart@the-challenge.org
